channel.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy
channel.description:
## Post your times available here with your timezone:
_Example:_
**ThePlex** : UK Any day 12:00 -> 23:00 (12pm - 11pm) (Mon-Sat)
**Eagle128** : Mid USA Almost any day: 09:00 -> 23:00 (9pm - 11pm)
**Murder Child** - CST Weekdays: 15:00 -> 20:00 (3pm - 8pm) Weekends: 08:00 -> 20:00 (8am - 8pm)
**Jammy/Ruby** - GMT Random times
**Alfa** - MTS Weekdays : 15:00 -> 07:00 (3pm - 7am) Weekends: All day/Random Times
**Tazily** : East USA Everyday: 09:00 -> 20:00 (9am - 8pm)
**Tryphon** : GMT+2 Weekdays: 13:00 -> 01:00 (1pm - 1am) Weekends: All day
**Orangeandblack** : EST/EDT Everyday: 03:30 -> 20:00 (3:30am - 8pm)
**Hippolytus** : GMT Most days: 10:00 -> 24:00 (10am - 12am) _Variably_
**Malchior** : EST Mon/Wed/Fri/Sat: 20:00 -> 24:00 (8pm to 12am) Other: Sporadic
**PKR** : GMT Random Times
**Gingerbeardgentleman** : MDT Anytime: 24:30 -> 02:00 | 10:00 -> 15:00 (12:30am - 2am | 10am - 3pm) _Note: Outside of these times on weekdays not avaliable. Inside those times are hit or miss_
**Rogue** : GMT+10 Random Times
**Dooku** : GMT+5 Whenever he's bored and not busy
**cbman** : GMT-5 (EST) Any day: 22:30 - 4:00 (10:30pm - 4am) Sparodically: 7:00 - 22:00 (7am - 10pm)
Going to gather as much info as I can to help organise an unofficial gathering event.
_Also if this is in the wrong place, sorrry mods <3_

item.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy
item.dc:creator: anon98616575
item.description:
GMT-5 (EST)
22:30 - 4:00 Any day
7:00 - 22:00 Sporadically

Also hi o/

Read full topic

item.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
Hi my name is Dooku.

[EST] Eastern Standard Time (GMT+5)
I’m on whenever I’m bored and feel like it <3 and not busy.

Read full topic

item.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy
item.dc:creator: Rogue
item.description:
GMT(+10)
Random Times
(However am on for a few minutes daily, most of the time.)

Read full topic

item.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy
item.dc:creator: gingerbeardgentleman
item.description:
gingerbeardgentleman

Mountain Daylight Time.

from 12:30 AM - 2:00 AM, and 10:00 AM - 3:00 PM.

Outside of those times on weekdays, I won’t be available, as I am either sleeping or working. inside of those times, it should be hit or miss.

Read full topic

item.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
PokemonKidRyan / PKR
GMT
Available at random times

Read full topic

item.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy
item.dc:creator: Malchior
item.description:
Malchior

EST (East USA)

Available Monday, Wednesday, Friday, Saturday from 20:00-24:00 EST.
Other times may be sporadic, but you’ll just see me in Discord in LFG room if I’m online and ready.

Read full topic

item.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy

item.description:
I’m Murder Child on Discord

-NozBugz/Murder Child

Read full topic

item.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
Variably free 10:00-24:00 GMT most days cuz I have like 5 frees every day with A-levels

Read full topic

item.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Oh, if it’s for a game of ToL I’m down, but also good luck finding a time that works

Read full topic

item.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
At some point, I wanna be able to get a specific time where everyone is free to get a giant session of up to 3/4 games at a time going. It’s wishful thinking but I wanna make it possible

Read full topic

item.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
EST/EDT
Available sporadically between when I wake up each day at 3:30 AM and go to bed around 8:00.

What is this for again?

Read full topic

item.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
GMT+2

13.00 - 1.00am (weekdays) | All day on weekends

Read full topic

item.title: Unofficial Time zone thingy
item.dc:creator: Queen_Alfa
item.description:
MTS - 15:00 -> 7:00 ish depending on when I fall asleep (on weekdays, on weekend I should be online about all day)

Read full topic
